Toothbrush Sanitizer: Develop a toothbrush sanitizer that uses UV light technology to disinfect the toothbrush after each use. This would be especially useful during the pandemic, as it would help reduce the risk of transmitting germs and bacteria.

Smart Toothbrush: Create a smart toothbrush that uses sensors and artificial intelligence to monitor brushing technique and provide real-time feedback to users. This could help improve brushing effectiveness and reduce the risk of dental problems.

Toothbrush with Built-In Toothpaste Dispenser: Develop a toothbrush with a built-in toothpaste dispenser that automatically releases the right amount of toothpaste with each brush stroke. This could help ensure consistent brushing and reduce waste.
Portable Toothbrush: Create a portable toothbrush that can be easily taken on the go, making it perfect for travel or for people who are always on the move.
